title: Raptor Maps (YC S16) Is Hiring a Lead DevOps Engineer for Solar Software
description: We’re looking for a talented full-time Lead DevOps Engineer to help develop and execute our DevOps strategy. You’re a hands on leader that is just as comfortable implementing as developing the skills of your team. You love to learn and are passionate about both customer and developer experience. In this role, you would dive right into our fast-paced, multi-faceted engineering team and play a vital role in scaling our developer experience and infrastructure.
